meanings.definition: To give an account of or tell a story
meanings.sent1: She narrates the tale of a brave knight.
meanings.sent2: He narrates bedtime stories to his children every night.
meanings.sent3: The cat narrates the adventures of a mischievous mouse.
meanings.sent4: The wind narrates the secrets of the ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's voice narrates memories of the past with warmth.

meanings.definition: To provide a spoken or written commentary on an event or series of events
meanings.sent1: The sports announcer narrates the exciting basketball game.
meanings.sent2: The historian narrates the details of the battle in his book.
meanings.sent3: The parrot hilariously narrates the family's dinner conversations.
meanings.sent4: The river narrates the history of the land through its flowing waters.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's voice narrates the lesson with clarity and enthusiasm.
